sinobrush.advancement.brush.desc: Let ink dance upon the canvas of paper
sinobrush.advancement.brush.name: Brushing Grace Upon Paper, no matter Fair or Faint
sinobrush.advancement.fan.description:
Legend has it that the storyteller Taoism Deeplake once wielded this very fan at TeaCon.
He roamed the world, no sword in hand,
Alone, he carried his tales across time.
sinobrush.advancement.fan.name: Traversing Mountains and Seas
sinobrush.advancement.root.desc: Painting Lives by Brush, Writing Elegance in Ink.
sinobrush.advancement.root.name: SinoBrush
sinobrush.advancement.unfold_fan.descrip:
With this folding fan in hand,
I shall face neither wind nor snow with fear.
sinobrush.advancement.unfold_fan.name: Chivalrous Heart and Righteous Spirit
sinobrush.description.fan.wrote: A folding fan, inscribed with some words: %s
sinobrush.description.folded_fan.1: Unfold this fan, and mountains and rivers emerge in soft ink.
sinobrush.description.folded_fan.2: Carry this fan, and fear no storms of life.
sinobrush.drawing.author.label: Author:
sinobrush.drawing.date.label: Date of Completion %2$s/%3$s/%1$s %4$s:%5$s:%6$s
sinobrush.drawing.title.label: Calligraphy
sinobrush.gui.brush.save_failed_no_brush: Sign failed: Why you want write without a writing brush?
sinobrush.gui.brush.save_failed_no_ink: Sign failed: No ink bottle provided
sinobrush.gui.brush.save_failed_output_o: Sign failed: Take the previous calligraphy first
sinobrush.gui.brush.tooltip_copy: Left click to copy, right click to paste
sinobrush.gui.brush.tooltip_save: Save the canvas to an image
